about_the_game:
Get Call of Duty® Points (CP)* and in-game content for Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6 and Call of Duty®: Warzone™.

Offering includes:

  • Battle Pass for Season 02

  • 20 Tier Skips

  • BlackCell Page Unlock

Plus, instantly unlock:

  • 1100 Call of Duty® Points

  • BlackCell Operator

  • Mastercraft Weapon Blueprint

  • Finishing Move

  • BlackCell Clan Tag

Players will also receive a 10% XP and WXP Loyalty Bonus for purchases of subsequent BlackCell Seasons (up to 50% for BO6 Seasons only). Plus, bonus BlackCell unlockable content, including BlackCell-only Battle Pass items and more.

Activision may update, replace, or remove this in-game content at any time.
detailed_description:
Get Call of Duty® Points (CP)* and in-game content for Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6 and Call of Duty®: Warzone™.

Offering includes:

  • Battle Pass for Season 02

  • 20 Tier Skips

  • BlackCell Page Unlock

Plus, instantly unlock:

  • 1100 Call of Duty® Points

  • BlackCell Operator

  • Mastercraft Weapon Blueprint

  • Finishing Move

  • BlackCell Clan Tag

Players will also receive a 10% XP and WXP Loyalty Bonus for purchases of subsequent BlackCell Seasons (up to 50% for BO6 Seasons only). Plus, bonus BlackCell unlockable content, including BlackCell-only Battle Pass items and more.

Activision may update, replace, or remove this in-game content at any time.
legal_notice:
*Use of CP is not available in all Call of Duty® games, is dependent on functionality and is subject to change. CP will be accessible once functionality for CP is enabled in that game and CP are made available. Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6 or Call of Duty®: Warzone™ must be launched and CP registered in-game before these CP will appear in other Call of Duty® games.

Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6 or Call of Duty®: Warzone™ required. Sold / downloaded separately.

For more information, please visit www.callofduty.com.

© 2025 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION, CALL OF DUTY, CALL OF DUTY BLACK OPS and CALL OF DUTY WARZONE are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc. All other trademarks and trade names are the properties of their respective owners. This product contains software technology licensed from Id Software ('Id Technology').
